line_1: Which promis'd honours of maturer growth;
line_2: In all that health and energy of youth,

line_1: Men are but children of a larger growth;
line_2: Blind to their good, to be instructed loth,

line_1: But evils are of necessary growth,
line_2: To rouze the brave, and banish sloth;

line_1: Pride has attain'd its most luxuriant growth,
line_2: And poison'd every virtue in them both.

line_1: Is virtue then, unless of christian growth,
line_2: Mere fallacy, or foolishness, or both,

line_1: Anticipate our Factions in their Growth,
line_2: And smother Feud beneath the Arms of Truth;

line_1: By heats unnatural push'd to sudden growth,
line_2: They sicken at th' inclement blasts of truth;

line_1: Has robb'd the neighbouring fields of half their growth;
line_2: The robe that wraps his limbs in silken sloth,
The gaping banks receded, as though loth

line_1: Of the mere school-boy's lean and tardy growth.
